title: Kino no Tabi: The Beautiful World - Byouki no Kuni - For You
title_jp: キノの旅 -the Beautiful World- 病気の国 -For You-
synopsis: Kino travels to a country divided into two parts: the very clean and peaceful city, closed off from the surrounding wastelands. She meets a little girl in the city suffering from a disease which is constantly being researched. The girl, however, does not know just how the research is being done.
